entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character in the story, mentioned as being weak and going to a feast.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend who is awake by now and running towards him screaming.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who throws his arms around Harry's middle and hugs him.

entities.name: justin
entities.description: A Hufflepuff student who hurries over to wring Harry's hand and apologise.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: The gamekeeper who is turning up at half past three, cuffing Harry and Ron hard on the shoulders.

relationships.description: Harry's friend Hermione is mentioned as running towards him screaming.
Justin hurries over to wring Harry's hand and apologise.
Hagrid is cuffing Harry hard on the shoulders.
Hagrid is cuffing Ron hard on the shoulders.
Harry's four hundred points are securing Gryffindor.
